casebody.data:
IN RE: SOUTHEASTERN EYE CENTER 358A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 15, 2017 Douglas S. Harris, Attorney at Law, for Harris, Douglas S. Scott F. Wyatt, Attorney at Law, High Point, Donavan J. Hylarides, Attorney at Law, for Harris, Richard A., et al. James Mark McDaniel, Jr., for McDaniel, James Mark (Jr.) Byron L. Saintsing, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Nivison Family Investments, LLC, et al. Robert E. Fields, III, Attorney at Law, Samuel Pinero, II, Attorney at Law, for Jeutter, Jr. receiver for CCSEA/SCLC/SEM/HUTA/EMS/KEPES/DRE.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd of November 2017 by Defendant (Douglas S. Harris) to Consolidate Appeals:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of November 2017."
